books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the creator of “30 Rock.”
books.name: BOSSYPANTS

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were extensively cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Shirley MacLaine
books.description: The actress offers observations on what remains important to her.
books.name: I'M OVER ALL THAT

books.author: by Ashley Judd with Maryanne Vollers
books.description: A memoir by the actress and humanitarian.
books.name: ALL THAT IS BITTER AND SWEET

books.author: by Jesse Ventura with Dick Russell
books.description: The former governor of Minnesota implores Americans to challenge government secrecy.
books.name: 63 DOCUMENTS THE GOVERNMENT DOESN'T WANT YOU TO READ

books.author: by Manning Marable
books.description: A biography that traces a path from Malcolm X’s troubled youth to his conversion to Islam to his split with the Nation of Islam to his assassination in 1965.
books.name: MALCOLM X

books.author: by David Brooks
books.description: Brooks creates two imaginary people, Harold and Erica, to illustrate his understanding of the human mind, the wellsprings of action and the causes of success and failure.
books.name: THE SOCIAL ANIMAL

books.author: by Joshua Foer
books.description: A journalist who covered a mnemonics championship tries competing himself.
books.name: MOONWALKING WITH EINSTEIN

books.author: by Sammy Hagar with Joel Selvin
books.description: Hagar tells of his tear through rock, from his first break with Montrose to his role as the front man of Van Halen.
books.name: RED

books.author: selected and introduced by Caroline Kennedy
books.description: Poems that inspired the former first daughter.
books.name: SHE WALKS IN BEAUTY

books.author: by Christopher McDougall
books.description: Secrets of distance running from a Mexican Indian tribe.
books.name: BORN TO RUN

books.author: by Michio Kaku
books.description: An examination of innovative developments in medicine, computers, quantum physics and space travel.
books.name: PHYSICS OF THE FUTURE

books.author: by Alexandra Horowitz
books.description: What the world is like from a dog’s point of view.
books.name: INSIDE OF A DOG
